entries.name: dependency
entries.desc: @return [Object] the dependency that could not be found

entries.name: new(dependency, required_by = [])
entries.desc: Initializes a new error with the given missing dependency. @param [Object] dependency @see {#dependency} @param [Array<Object>] #required_by @see {#required_by}

entries.name: message()
entries.desc: The error message for the missing dependency, including the specifications that had this dependency.
